sections.heading: Stay of proceedings10-743.Stay of proceedingsIf the corporation commences an inquiry into the allegations made in the demand or complaint, the court may stay any derivative proceeding for such period as the court deems appropriate
sections.text: Stay of proceedings10-743.Stay of proceedingsIf the corporation commences an inquiry into the allegations made in the demand or complaint, the court may stay any derivative proceeding for such period as the court deems appropriate.
